title: Travel and Tourism 1
sentences: Tomorrow I have a direct flight to Madrid.
Don't forget to take your passport to go through customs.
I have to check my suitcase because it is very big.
What time does our plane leave?
I bought a round-trip ticket because it is cheaper.
The train arrives at the station ten minutes late.
I prefer the window seat to see the landscape.
Mi hermano prefiere el asiento de
My brother prefers the aisle seat to get up easily.
Where is boarding gate number five?
de dos horas por el tiempo.
The flight has a two-hour delay due to the weather.
en un hotel cerca del centro.
I have made a reservation at a hotel near the center.
What time is breakfast at this hotel?
I need the key to my room, please.
The receptionist was very kind to us.
I want a room with sea views.
How much does the accommodation cost for one night?
We are tourists and we are visiting the museums.
nos explicó la historia de la catedral.
The guide explained the history of the cathedral to us.
Look at the map to know where we are.
We are carrying a lot of luggage for such a short trip.
I have to go through customs upon arriving at the airport.
Where can I exchange money for euros?
I like to travel in economy class to save.
Is there free Wi-Fi in the room?
Tengo que dejar la habitación al
I have to leave the room at midday.
Can you call a taxi to go to the airport?
The boat trip was very calm.
Can you give me a brochure with information about the city?
We left a small tip for the waiter.
Have a good trip and have a lot of fun!
